snippet: In seeking a domestic source for natural rubber, Cooper Tire and Rubber Company has created a way to make tires with rubber from the guayule plant, which thrives in the Southwest.
abstract: Cooper Tire & Rubber Company is expected to demonstrate tires produced from desert shrub guayule plant, important milestone for industry that has long sought American source of rubber; company will lead consortium to develop and market guayule-derived rubber.
lead_paragraph: In seeking a domestic source for natural rubber, Cooper Tire and Rubber Company has created a way to make tires with rubber from the guayule plant, which thrives in the Southwest.

headline.main: Making Tires From a Desert Shrub Found in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Making Tires From a Desert Shrub Found in the U.S.
